titleStmt.title: Atheismus vapulans, or, A treatise against atheism, rationally confuting the atheists of these times by Will. Towers ... Polytheismus vapulans, or, There is but one God.
titleStmt.author: Towers, William, 1617?-1666.
Towers, William, 1617?-1666. Polytheismus vapulans.

notesStmt.note: Added t.p. and separate paging ([10], 136 p.): Polytheismus vapulans, or, There is but one God. Catchword on p. 187 indicates that these two titles were published as a unit.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
